00039 namespace Hypertable {

00041   String Event::to_str() {
00042     string dstr;
00043 
00044     dstr = "Event: type=";
00045     if (type == CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED)
00046       dstr += "CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED";
00047     else if (type == DISCONNECT)
00048       dstr += "DISCONNECT";
00049     else if (type == MESSAGE) {
00050       dstr += "MESSAGE protocol=";
00051       if (header->protocol < Header::PROTOCOL_MAX)
00052         dstr += Header::protocol_strs[header->protocol];
00053       else
00054         dstr += "unknown";
00055       dstr += (String)" id=" + (int)header->id;
00056       dstr += (String)" gid=" + (int)header->gid;
00057       dstr += (String)" header_len=" + (int)header->header_len;
00058       dstr += (String)" total_len=" + (int)header->total_len;
00059     }
00060     else if (type == TIMER)
00061       dstr += "TIMER";
00062     else if (type == ERROR)
00063       dstr += "ERROR";
00064     else
00065       dstr += (int)type;
00066 
00067     if (error != Error::OK)
00068       dstr += (String)" \"" + Error::get_text(error) + "\"";
00069 
00070     if (type != TIMER) {
00071       dstr += " from=";
00072       dstr += (String)inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr) + ":" + (int)ntohs(addr.sin_port);
00073     }
00074 
00075     return dstr;
00076   }
00077 
00078 }
